msContents.summary: Tomos synkollesimos of over 50 letters; at least 10 addressed to or by Postumius Aurelianus

supportDesc.support: 21 frames. Remainder set aside in box I.Frame 13:1, cols. i-ii, (col. i): 182 x 260, (A) 11 lines, right left bottom margins, (B) 3 lines, bottom margin, (col. ii): 153 x 62, (A) see DP 13(Second text) qua, (B) 18 lines,Frame 13:2, cols. iii-iv, (col. iii): 180 x 69, (A) 6 lines, bottom margin, (B)blank, (col. iv): 185 x 220, (A) 10 lines, left margin, (B) 1 line, all marginsFrame 13:3, cols. v-vii, (col. v): 192 x 166, (A) 15 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (col. vi): 187 x 84, (A) 6 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (col. vii): 186 x 86, (A) 16 lines, right margin, (B) blankFrame 13:4, cols., viii-ixFrame 13:5, cols., x-xiFrame 13:6, cols., xii-xiiiFrame 13:7, cols., xiv-xviiiFrame 13:8, cols., xvii-xviiiFrame 13:9, cols., xix-xxFrame 13:10, cols., xxi-xxiiFrame 13:11, cols., xxiii-xxviFrame 13:12, cols., xxviii-xxixFrame 13:13, cols., xxxi-xxxiiiFrame 13:14, cols., xxxiv-xxxvFrame 13:15, cols., xxxvi-xxxviiiFrame 13:16, cols., xxxix-xiFrame 13:17, cols., xlii-xlivFrame 13:18, cols., xlv-xlviFrame 13:19, cols., xlvii-col.lFrame 13:20Frame 13:21
